text: haey( chaur changcha) nowpel del mou sa niyeay towkean krom robsa keat tha ao krom robsakhnhom. hetoaveibeanchea puok anak thveubeab khnhom khn del puok anakdoeng chbasa tha khnhom pitchea anakneasar robsa a l laoh mk kan puok anak noh? haey nowpel del puokke kech chenh( pi meakra a l laoh) a l laoh kaban thveu aoy chetd robsa puokke kante khleatachhngay ( pi meakra a l laoh) towtiet . haey a l laoh min changaoulobangheanh champoh krom del lmeusa nung batobanhchea robsa trong laey
